info.description: Allows the creation, viewing and management of payment orders
info.title: Order Payment Orders APIs

parameters.name: page_size
parameters.description: The total number of records per page

parameters.name: page_start
parameters.description: The record from which the response should be displayed

parameters.name: page_token
parameters.description: Random and unique string for each page. Used for security purpose

parameters.description: The total number of records per page

narratives.description: The additional text printed on descriptive statements in addition to the standard narrative and/or reference

narrative.description: The additional text printed on descriptive statements in addition to the standard narrative and/or reference

additionalInformations.description: Additional Information provided to add context

additionalInformation.description: Additional Information provided to add context

invoiceReferences.description: It provides the reference of the invoice

invoiceReference.description: It provides the reference of the invoice

paymentOrderProductId.description: The identifier of the payment order product

debitAccountId.description: The identifier of the debit account

creditAccountId.description: The identifier of the credit account

orderingCustomerId.description: The identifier of the ordering customer

orderingCustomerName.description: The name that is displayed for the ordering customer

paymentCurrency.description: Holds the list of currencies for which the payment order will be accepted for the country and payment order with any currencies other than one defined will not be allowed.When left undefined then payment order will be open for all currencies

orderingPaymentTreasuryRate.description: The treasury rate for the conversion between payment currency and ordering currency

orderingPaymentFxSpread.description: The customer spread for the conversion between payment currency and ordering currency

orderingReference.description: The reference related to the ordering details

chargeBearer.description: Bearer of the charges of the order

beneficiaryAccountId.description: The identifier of the beneficiary account

beneficiaryBIC.description: BIC (Bank Identifier Code) of the beneficiary customer

beneficiaryName.description: The name displayed of the beneficiary

accountWithBankBIC.description: BIC of Account with Bank being the bank where the beneficiary maintains his account.

beneficiaryBankClearingCode.description: Clearing code or sort code of the beneficiary bank

accountWithBankClearingCode.description: Clearing code or sort code of the account with bank being the bank where the beneficiary maintains his account.

clearingChannel.description: Clearing channel for the payment order

beneficiaryIBAN.description: The IBAN of the beneficiary's account

accountWithBankIBAN.description: IBAN of Account with Bank being the bank where the beneficiary maintains his account.

requiredCreditValueDate.description: The credit value date i.e. tentative date on which the payment system will process the payment

endToEndReference.description: This field is used for SEPA

instructionIdReference.description: The reference used in SEPA payments to indicate the type of payment

termsAndConditions.description: The description of the terms and conditions

displayName.description: The name used for display purposes

sortCode.description: The bank identifier code which identifies both the bank and the branch where the account is held

clearingChannel.description: Clearing channel for the payment order

paymentCurrency.description: Holds the list of currencies for which the payment order will be accepted for the country and payment order with any currencies other than one defined will not be allowed.When left undefined then payment order will be open for all currencies

paymentOrderProductId.description: The identifier of the payment order product

displayName.description: The name used for display purposes

paymentProductGroup.description: The product group to which the payment belongs e.g. 'Account to Account Transfers', 'Domestic' or 'International' etc

payThroughBeneficiary.description: Defines whether Payment is done through the Beneficiary or not

paymentCurrency.description: Holds the list of currencies for which the payment order will be accepted for the country and payment order with any currencies other than one defined will not be allowed.When left undefined then payment order will be open for all currencies

requiredCreditValue.description: Defines whether the credit value date is required

countryId.description: The identifier of the country, normally the SWIFT code of the country.

sortCode.description: The bank identifier code which identifies both the bank and the branch where the account is held

clearingChannel.description: Clearing channel for the payment order

narrative.description: The additional text printed on descriptive statements in addition to the standard narrative and/or reference

additionalInformation.description: Additional Information provided to add context

allowFx.description: Defines whether credit and debit amounts may be in different currencies.

defaultChargeOption.description: Default Charger bearer for the product, e.g. a)None b)Recipient To Pay All Charges c)Pay My Bank's Charges d) Pay My Bank Charges Only.

paymentOrderPurposeCodeId.description: The identifier of the payment order purpose code

displayName.description: The name used for display purposes

treasuryRate.description: The Treasury rate for the conversion between payment currency and the ordering currency
